name: Murfreesboro Aviations
about: Murfreesboro Aviation, the busiest privately-owned flight school in Tennessee, is dedicated to providing top-notch flight training from beginners to advanced pilots. Founded by Jim Gardner, a veteran and former fire investigator, the school emphasizes safety, prevention, and trust. With a well-equipped training fleet and an in-house maintenance department, Murfreesboro Aviation ensures all aircraft are safe and well-maintained. The school offers various training programs, including private pilot, multi-engine, and instrument ratings, as well as certified flight instructor certifications. Known for its "Up Here, Itâ€™s About Trust" philosophy, Murfreesboro Aviation prioritizes customer safety and proficiency, making it a trusted name in aviation training. Whether you're starting with a Discovery Flight or pursuing advanced certifications, Murfreesboro Aviation is committed to delivering exceptional service and education.
services:
